entry.title: New release for Git-Sync: v0.9.1
entry.content:

  • 0b10d0fefadcbcc95c0a46d0f902a64ed5f584ea build(deps): :arrow_up: go-gitlab and oauth2 dependencies bumped up

entry.title: New release for Git-Sync: v0.10.0
entry.content:
What's New ‚ùï

git-sync now adds support for another client, which is forgejo.

Thanks to @jbonadiman for adding the support! üéâ

Changelog

  • 81b295e66bbd2d17b36906a4f73ffbb8698d25a1 feat: :sparkles: forgejo support added

entry.title: New release for Git-Sync: v0.11.0
entry.content:
What's New ‚ùï

git-sync now supports a new config option called clone_type. By default git-sync performs a bare clone of your repository code. However with this new release, you can now specify which type of clone you want to perform.

The available options are bare, shallow, mirror or full. The default value is bare (to maintain backward compatibility).

Update your config file as mentioned in the docs to use this new feature.

Changelog

  • 9a3e9fe90b6d9c3d6c157bcaae35811ed7aaf843 feat: :sparkles: allow different clone type options

entry.title: New release for Git-Sync: v0.11.1
entry.content:
Changelog

  • 4c0389e90f3d851a3c11c8b74c4925a06125bf6c build(deps): :arrow_up: upgrade go to 1.23.2
  • eb960225c97f01c7b74513d8e5fd2f5d6b689338 chore(deps): update golang docker tag to v1.23.2 (#51)
  • 082c787d7cc60448dc5977440d9eddedd45e3fc8 chore(deps): update module github.com/google/go-github/v65 to v66 (#56)
  • 3117d475d30aaf7c1bb0a4a0ad5d78c25d1e7b09 chore(deps): update module github.com/google/go-github/v65 to v66 (#57)
  • f01c5751193c6af259f23f4dcbc464b221d30024 chore(deps): update module github.com/xanzy/go-gitlab to v0.111.0 (#54)
  • 88b1bb8ba10b4809d787c77fd12651c1ac39bda8 chore: :recycle: remove labels
  • 20b04da1f94e94b54f98cfc8bea7be2364363d6c chore: :truck: move initial config fetcher to config package
  • 38d164fd6b9eed4fee6cb2321d5f1e7eefd7d8c0 chore: :wrench: update step name
  • db66fc70faa29840835ffb243b6f97411147e98c ci: :adhesive_bandage: pass build args correctly
  • 8413ce3963319a7a3b99e48b042874f9df87cdc5 ci: :wrench: run tests on CI
  • 7302046f799b68d06b1318677aa956d193bdd1f5 ci: :wrench: update multi-platform build to run on different runners
  • bbf6b40e7a3e4352302b9aaaf6c77d11744abea5 feat: :sparkles: use cache between docker builds
  • 4741a1f69fb3f65ea17c9e6e41aad2a10fc878a8 feat: :white_check_mark: validate config test added
  • 588fab8de478125ae822715a48a3813961ecf2af fix: :bug: pass build args as list instead of csv
  • 9fd19cd4d835d6fa79970ae588b9b5c903f54510 fix: :bug: sync using origin remote by default (#55)
